content:
{"name": "The Legacy Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* The clients  are served by last names every other week. Example:
	* Oct 5th - Nov 2nd  Clients with last names starting with N-Z.
	* Oct 26th - Nov 16th Clients with last names starting with A-M.
	* Please disregard any appointment sent to you when it is not your scheduled day 
	* the last time get on line is 11:45 am
	* No appointments on 16th, 23rd and 30th Nov .. ", "email": "", "url": "www.tlcnyc.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "71-02 Cypress Hills Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Glendale", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11385", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.701492, "longitude": -73.89238}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 456-4852", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
